# Arcane Lock, Improved (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, M (gold dust worth 25 gp, plus 5 gp per individual attuned)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Door, chest, or *portal* touched, up to 30 sq. ft./level in size

**Duration:** Permanent

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Stronghold Builder's Guidebook (WotC), pg. 51

This spell works identically to *[[Arcane Lock (Spell)|arcane lock]]*, except that at the time of casting you may attune up to 1 individual per caster level to the object targeted by the spell. These individuals (who need not be present during casting) can freely pass the *improved arcane lock* as if they had cast the spell.
